name: nearby_stores
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool target_com_shopping_api.
Tool description: Realtime APIs support entire shopping flow on Target.com.
(Free trial enabled)

API description: Fetches a list of stores near a specified ZIP code from the RapidAPI Target API.

place.description: The ZIP code or address around which to search for stores.

within.description: The radius of the search area in miles. Defaults to '100'.

limit.description: The maximum number of store results to return. Defaults to '20'.
